data.text: @GiveUsAQuid How many times do you want to shout at them “you don’t even know why you’re wearing it, you absolute dickhead!” 😆

@anniemurray66 They'd have been crying in their soy lattes if they'd seen my local Hard-Right Wetherspoons last night, where in nearly 3 hours I spotted only a single mask-wearer (a young lady walking in with her unmasked boyfriend), who took it off as soon as she sat down!
@GiveUsAQuid The mad muzzle wearers are still so upset that they’re the only ones who care 🥱
@si_talopram Indeed it does, Our CMANE, have tweeted on that in the last hour (in case you've not seen it).
@GiveUsAQuid Well, they are so nice and polite that they have me convinced. Although Pfizer’s document release does give room for mmmm?
@Northernmanv2 @GreatishPete You'll miss them when they've gawn, FN!
@GiveUsAQuid @GreatishPete I do feel that they are running out of steam now FL.  They are turning into the mono-themed "Give me one benefit of Brexit" remoaners.

@GiveUsAQuid They fester in those lost years
And affixiate in self piteous tears.
@GiveUsAQuid Was there no room in your awards for Our Pete and his COVID Concious Company? I suppose the lack of eff words in his tweet eliminates him?
